A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I had never left a movie theatre angry until I watched this horrible insult to the franchise. Director Johnson will be shunned forever in the Star Wars universe and we all wholeheartedly agree with everything Mark Hamill had said about how he and all the fans were fundamentally disagree about the way the character in the movie is portrayed. Horrible last stand for Luke Skywalker\, my childhood hero and of course a lot of filler and garbage and no actual real plot\, aside from not running out of gas 🤮
